articles.description: Mosquitos are responsible for spreading many dangerous diseases like dengue, malaria, chikungunya, and the Zika virus.
articles.content: Reported By:| Edited By: DNA Web Team |Source: DNA webdesk |Updated: Dec 16, 2022, 12:54 PM ISTIf you feel you are more prone to get mosquito bites than people near you then it may have something to … [+1713 chars]
